sentences.sentence: And muggins here had to clean up all the mess.
sentences.translation: 而我这个傻瓜现在不得不清理这个烂摊子。

sentences.sentence: Muggins here locked his keys in the car!
sentences.translation: 这笨蛋把自己的钥匙锁在汽车里了！

sentences.sentence: Everyone disappeared after dinner, leaving muggins to to the washing-up.
sentences.translation: 每个人晚餐后都消失了，留下我这个呆子在洗碗。
